attributes.action: To Save High Wycombe general Hospital
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to stop the NHS from down grading our local hospital. When their is an  accident you go to Stoke Mandeville or Wexham Park Hospital, even if the accident was a mile from High Wycombe Hospital.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
